title: (x) Mercedes Monster headline - Corporate A {Stephen}
content:
People have posted this Mercedes font question before, though this seems smaller than the rest. Is this Corporate A?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808232644im_/http:/typophile.com/files/monster_5244.jpg)

 [‹ Patriots jersey name](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808232644/http:/typophile.com/node/19702 "Go to previous forum topic") [totobola ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808232644/http:/typophile.com/node/19720 "Go to next forum topic")
author: giljimenez

comments.content: It is. Looks like someone [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808232644/http:/typophile.com/wiki/squooshed) [Corporate A Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808232644/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=UR.110926.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=In+an+age+of+monster&sampleSize=32).

That font has some odd characteristics. It looks fairly normal to me at small sizes, but gets more fun looking as it gets bigger. I was thinking I have to have this...then I saw the price - $600 for the set.

In the “doesn’t hurt to ask” category, Dr. Weidemann, or anyone from URW, if you need a beta-tester to represent the average user (read moron if you wish), I am your man. Suffice to say, I am unusually gifted at finding out how something can be broken.  
: )
